content: additional yarn for any increases you make pattern using c1 and the 4 0mm needle cast on 100 sts join in the round ensuring stitches are not twisted place a stitch marker work a k1tbl p1 ribbing until work measures 4cm using the 4 5mm needle commence working from the chart return here if you wish to follow written instructions for the two colour decreases from round 28 otherwise continue the chart until the end change to double pointed needles when necessary round 28 *using c1 knit one c2 knit one c1 knit one c2 ssk c2 knit one c2 k2tog c1 knit one c2 knit one* - repeat from * to * til end of round 80 sts rem rounds 29 & 30 knit in the colours as seen on needle from previous round round 31 *using c1 knit one c2 knit one c1 ssk c2 knit one c1 k2tog c2 knit one* - repeat from * to * til end of round 60 sts rem rounds 32 & 33 knit in the colours as seen on needle from previous round round 34 *using c1 knit one c2 knit one c1 ssk c2 k2tog* - repeat from * to * til end of round 40 sts rem rounds 35 & 36 knit in the colours as seen on needle from previous round round 37 *using c1 ssk c2 k2tog* - repeat from * to * til end of round 20 sts rem round 38 using c2 knit all stitches round 39 using c1 knit all stitches round 40 using c2 k2tog entire round 10 sts rem 2 spendigo 2025 ©sandra levey - released 7 june 2025 cut off both colours leaving sufficient length for weaving in tails slip remaining 10 sts onto a tapestry needle and pull closed then pushing needle to inside and ensuring sts are neatly closed before weaving in ends if wishing to make any difference to the height of the beanie do so at the very beginning of the chart if you find the height too much for a smaller head start at round 4 or 6 if wanting to try bulky weight yarn you might prefer to start from round 6 or 8 these suggestions have not been tested but are merely to give some guidance to make use of multiple yarn weights new born sized - appx 40-42cm chart worked from round one as written cotton fingering weight using entire pattern as above but using three written colours needles 2 5mm and 2 75mm 25gms used tester suggests adding 5 plain rounds at round 1 for a 3 month old ©yarnymama used with her permission © weave in all ends block and enjoy wearing i d love to see your project on ravelry please use tag #spendigo2025 on other social media ~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~ 3
